allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix staged leads display order and row numbering

- Order staged leads by rowNumber to preserve Excel import order
- Start row numbers from 1 instead of 2 for sequential display

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git merge feature/excel-import-export --no-ff -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge feature/excel-import-export: Excel import/export with staging workflow

Features:
- Excel import with dynamic header detection
- Lead staging workflow with validation
- Staged leads display in original Excel order
- Sequential row numbering from 1
- Approve valid leads / discard batch functionality
EOF
\)")
